twcore.bots.twrcbot
Class twrcbot

java.lang.Object
  twcore.core.SubspaceBot
      twcore.bots.twrcbot.twrcbot

public class twrcbot
extends SubspaceBot

Bot for TWRC signups Also allows ops to update points New version shows people points data.

Version:
1.7
Author:
Jacen Solo
